column3:
It seems more logical to have a /rest/chaininfo.json which returns a JSON object containing best block hash, and is expandable to more useful info in the future.

Basically 'getblockchaininfo' exported via REST, in other words.
ChainInfos makes more sense.\nChanges the PR to support getchaininfos.\n
Looks mostly OK at first glance.  Only nit is including unrelated cleanups in the same commit.\n
Okay. Fixed the smuggled cleanups. Added docs update.\n
ut ACK, though interested in comments from others.\n
